text: Ani jevha mariyamace putra isa mhanale, he (majhya lokanno!) Isra'ilaci santati! Mi tumha sarvankade allahaca rasula (paigambara) ahe, majhya purvica grantha tauratace samarthana karanara ahe ani apalyanantara yenarya eka paigambaraci khusakhabara aikavinara ahe, jyance nava ahamada ahe. Maga jevha te tyancyasamora spasta nisanya ghe'una ale, tevha te mhanu lagale ki hi tara ughada jadu ahe
